lines: 1. Toiroka ababisa,Nyasae nakorende;Ins'ase chimbaba chiaye,Nyasae nakorende.
Nyasae nakorende,'Kero gionsi nchera chionsi,Igo nakorende,Nyasae nakorende(nakorende)
2. Kero ki' amatuk'amabe,Nyasae nakorende;Nony' as' obororo bwonsi,Nyasae nakorende.
3. Nako' okogania kwao,Nyasae nakorende;Takwang' ogosaba kwao,Nyasae nakorende.
4. As' amatemw' ande onsi,Nyasae nakorende;'Morosu eegek' asare,Nyasae nakorende.
